title: Planned delivery date of {{itemName}} for {{orderId}}
description: The date entered will be applied to all the organisations you’ll be ordering for. We’ve included the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement, but if your planned delivery date is different, you can change it here.
insetAdvice: You'll be able to alter the planned delivery date for individual organisations later if required.

expandableSection.title: What date should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent:
Enter the planned delivery date you've agreed with the supplier. This is the day that each of the listed Service Recipients will start using this Catalogue Solution.

We've included the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement, but you can change it if you’ve agreed a different delivery date.

errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateInvalid: Enter a planned delivery date in a valid format
errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateGreaterThan: Planned delivery date must be in the future or within the last 60 days
errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateNotReal: Planned delivery date must be a real date
errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateDayRequired: Planned delivery date must include a day
errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateMonthRequired: Planned delivery date must include a month
errorMessages.PlannedDeliveryDateYearRequired: Planned delivery date must include a year
